GisXmlAttribute Class Reference

#include <Attribute.h>

Inherits GisDictionaryElement.

Inheritance diagram for GisXmlAttribute:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

GisXmlAttribute contains the name and value of a single attribute from an XML document.

Definition at line 27 of file Attribute.h.
